We want to put the largest digit in the highest place value. 

Which digit is the largest?

$\greenD9$ is the largest digit, and we want to put it in the position with the highest place value.   

  So $\greenD9$ will be in the hundred thousands place: 
 $\greenD{9}$ $\_$ $\_{,}$ $\_$ $\_$ $\_$

Now we need to do the same thing with the next largest digit:  $\blueD7$.  

  So  $\blueD7$ goes in the ten thousands place:  

$\greenD{9}\blueD7 $\_${,}$ $\_$ $\_$ $\_$

We can continue placing the next largest digit in the next largest place value until we have placed all six digits:

$\greenD{9}\blueD76{,}421$
The greatest possible number we can make is $976{,}421$.

question.content:
